welcome.title: Welcome to my portfolio!
welcome.subtitle: I'm a FullStack Developer
welcome.description: Creating modern and responsive web applications
welcome.subtitle1: Always glad to see you, on my site!

homepage.aboutMeText:
My name is Michael David Vizenovsky, and I am a FullStack developer.
I learned this interesting profession in the PROG institute ğŸ‘‰ https://www.prog.co.il/
And I had the honor of attending the classes of the coolest programmers in Israel - Israel Dahan and Rahamim Hania.
homepage.moosebroText: In the development industry and in commercial projects, I am also known as "MOOSEBRO"

footer.title: Miky Vizenovsky
footer.description: FullStack Developer with experience in creating modern, responsive web applications.

start.title: Beginning of the journey
start.subtitle: First steps in programming
start.text: Wrote my first program in C# and decided to connect my career with IT.

basics.title: Web Development Basics
basics.subtitle: HTML, CSS, JavaScript
basics.text: Started my web development journey, mastering fundamental technologies and creating first projects.

frontend.title: Frontend Frameworks
frontend.subtitle: Vue.js and React.js
frontend.text: Dived into modern frameworks, started building dynamic SPA applications.

backend.title: Backend Development
backend.subtitle: Node.js and databases
backend.text: Expanded skills to server-side development, learned API and database work.

fullstack.title: Full Stack Developer
fullstack.subtitle: From idea to production
fullstack.text: Combined all knowledge in creating complete web applications of full cycle.

growth.title: Growth and Development
growth.subtitle: New horizons
growth.text: Continue learning new technologies and developing as a programmer.
